section_title: METHODOLOGICAL ISSUES UNDER THE CONVENTION: Greenhouse gas data interface
sentences: Chair Brown reported on agreement during informal consultations and parties adopted SBSTA conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2007/L.15).
Annual report of the technical review of Annex I inventories: Co-Chair Herold reported agreement on this issue, and parties adopted the conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2007/L.12).
Emissions from fuel used for international aviation and maritime transport: SBSTA Chair Kumarsingh reported no agreement in spite of his consultations.
Parties agreed to forward this matter to SBSTA 28 for its consideration.
NORWAY regretted progress being blocked by some parties and stated that including bunker fuels in a post-2012 regime is a priority.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
